alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 07 at 7:42PM MST until February 08 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 MPH with gusts up to 70 MPH possible. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and Adjacent Foothills including Interstate 80 between Laramie and Cheyenne. Interstate 25 corridor in central Laramie and eastern Platte Counties including the cities of Cheyenne and Wheatland. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
